name: CEO & CTO
desc: I founded a start-up called ParaGO and have been undergoing an incubation program for nearly 8 months now.

name: Freelancer
desc: I have been working as a freelance graphic designer for nearly 7 years, and I have also been a full-stack developer for the past 7 months.

name: Officer
